title: Sweet Sleep
author: Eazy E
citation: Eazy E. "Sweet Sleep: experience with Mirtazapine (Remeron) (ID 53694)". Erowid.org. Jun 8, 2006. erowid.org/exp/53694
report: I have used Remeron a lot to help me sleep. It helps some with depression although I found that meditating and praying to God helped my depression more.
Anyways, here is what I have experienced on remeron.
First of all crazy dreams, very intense and vivid.
Some cravings for sweets when on it, it makes me hungry sometimes.
When I started taking it the remeron makes me sleep for like 24 hours straight.
